text:
The queue management at DBS Parkway is appalling. A couple of weeks ago my daughter who works abroad asked for assistance to open an account. The male staff brushed off and told her to use the scanner and online. She  found that it was not as direct or simple as in her case.  If he took time to listen, he could have saved alot of hassle for her.
Personally,  I  find some of the staff are not happy to do this particular job, they are impatient especially with senior customers and clueless in managing skill. It's always chaotic at the entrance even when it's not busy! I have had better customer service at other branches of DBS.

Zulyna and her colleague at the mortgage department at DBS Parkway exhibited high professionalism this afternoon in assisting me to conclude my mortgage business. In particular Zulyna's patient explanation was clear and concise and helped me clarify my doubt. It gave me great satisfaction to be serviced so well. Kudos to their good work!
Thank you Ms Kalaivani for the kind assistance me. She was so patient and kind to empathise w my situation after heading to 3 different DBS/POSB banks. Life saver! Thank you so much, God bless!

I recently opened a bank account at the DBS  Parkway Parade Branch and I had an exceptional experience, thanks to the assistance of Wei Ching.

She was incredibly patient and helpful throughout the entire process. Wei Ching explained everything clearly and answered all my questions thoroughly. She made the account opening process smooth and efficient.

I highly recommend this branch and would specifically like to commend Wei Ching for her outstanding customer service!

Few days back had a very good experience with IT digital ambassador, Mr Anthony who whisked me through the DBS app with much enthusiasm and speed. Thank you Mr Anthony for a good experience in this bank, for providing some good service in an otherwise dreary and very slow many hours wait, as usual, in DBS.
